title: #61: More Behavioral Analysis from the Baton Rouge Killings
description:
Behavioural analysis continues of the 8 women who were stalked and murdered in Baton Rouge by a serial killer. The team also discuss the psychology of the killer including his paraphilias.
Warning this pod contains graphic content #KillingBayous
